https://tmrev.io/movie/87238-Adaptive Kalash 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null The Kalashnikov Rifle - misunderstood and underestimated by the media, often portrayed as inaccurate and unwieldy - is so widely adopted across the world it deserves fairer treatment by end users. The Adaptive Kalash training video introduces the viewer to the proper handling and usage of this rifle. Adaptive Kalash
